title: Cannot synchronize a .java file and another resource
description: When trying to synchronize a .java file with another resource in the package viewer, the Team entry is not present in the context menu. It should be.
OB: When selecting a .java file and another resource (such as a .properties file) in the package viewer, the context menu does not display the Team entry.
EB: The Team entry should be present in the context menu when selecting a .java file and another resource.
SR: To reproduce the issue:  1. Open the package viewer. 2. Select a .java file and another resource (e.g., a .properties file).
